Articles.Content:
error404. button not found. new button generated: ban Camacha for chating in a game thread. *BOOP*

push to fly

Edited November 15, 2015 by megatiger78

I would press the button, but I'm not a moderator

You detonate every nuclear warhead on the planet, but it creates a sense of unity that brings us into the "Star Trek" space age

*BOOP* *BOOP* *BOOP* *BOOP*.....

press for

spees mahreens.

Would not press

Press button for Early access to 1.1 but you can't tell anyone about it or you die instantly.

I'd press it.

And tell it to everyone.

And shoot everyone who tries to make me perish.

Press button for epic MLGness but you won't be allowed in FaZe.

But FaZe wont let me een witowht pro strahts. Soo is doobl negtiff. Wood prss cuz der r otheeer clanns tht wood let me in.

You get to see through walls, but your deaf, or you are blind but get to hear incredible well, so you can hear gunshots and crime from miles away. What would you choose, and would you press the button?

See through walls you don't need ears to live as much as eyes

Push the button get 100 containers of spam

100 containers of spam? Sure; I'll just return to sender.

Push the button to lock this thread BUT KSP 2.0 releases with all new unity 5 code, load textures on demand, improved aero that is even better than FAR, integrated Kerbal Alarm Clock, and more.

Lol sure, I can create new version of this thread

Push the button for money spawning glued to your right hand each second.

I would not push the button.

If you push the button, there is a 50% chance the entire world becomes capitalist, and 50% chance the world becomes communist.

I wouldn't push it, because it would do NOTHING good what so ever.

Alright, if you push the button, then completely safe rtg powered electric cars are commercially available for the price of a high-end electric car, you get one for free.

BUT, since its NUCLEAR, you will occasionally have to put up with protests against the "Radioactive car", and maybe even some personal harassment against you

I would press it, because soon enough I won't be the only one with an RTG electric car, therefore I wouldn't be the only one who has to deal with protesting.

Press the button to get a supercomputer, but no more Internet.

Oh hells yes! I press the button several times, so many times that the supercomputer explodes.

Press the button to make deep space colonization a reality but we all become communists.

I would make a Russian press it.

Press the button to delete KSP.

NO!

press the button to poop cake(not poop cake, real cake) but you are too fat to not crush any toilet or bowl.

Never, who likes that anyway.

Press the button for MLG.

Nope.

Press the button for MLB, but the NBA is a thing, too.

Thanks, but no thanks...

Press for even MOAR MLG KSP!

No, I do not like strange three letter initialisms, they're almost always associated with a Government Agency trying to TAKEOVER THE WORLD!

Would you press the button to end all conflict on earth at the cost of individuality?

Nope.

Would you press it for getting rid of nukes forever, but the worldwide economy tanks?

Totally. Easier to rebuild from that than a nuclear holocaust.

Would you press it if it meant you had to wear plaid shirts every day for the rest of your life, but added 10 years to your lifespan?

Yeah. Plaid isn't badTM

If you push the button, squad spends 6 months on an update that squashes every last bug (Including porting the game to unity V, and fixing balancing issues) in the game, and with no new content. The update after would feature multiplayer, more planets, and other awesome content that we've been wanting for years, but it would take another year to be released, in order to keep up with the new bug free standard that was set.

No way! The bugs are what make KSP fun for me.

Push it and get an ice cream cone, but you have to walk past a starving child on the way back and you can't give him the cone.

Okay. Do I get to flip off the kid with my ice cream covered fingers as a I walk by him? JK, I would probably take him to the button, and have him press it too.

Push the button and you receive 500,000$, but a random person dies.

no not now not never (wait is that a double negitive?)

push the button get 1000000000 USD but a random world leader dies
